snippet: One-way tickets and convoluted routes are two of the strategies one business traveler uses to work the system for the lowest airfares.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column notes one-way tickets and convoluted routes are two of the strategies one business traveler uses to work the system for the lowest airfares.
